page.title: 17Schoolwear:Hayley & Suzanne
page.content: H)When I am at{school}I wear a yellow and white{poly/cotton skirt or dress } and a top to go with the skirt in the summer. In the winter I wear a grey skirt or dress and a blouse to go with the skirt. My{tie}has yellow and black stripes on it. If it is a wet day I wear a warm skirt and a warm top and an{anorak}to keep me dry.I would wear some{shoes}that would keep my feet dry rather than{sandals}. As I come to school by{car}I don't usually get my feet wet. S)Today I am wearing a{red skirt}and a {black and white top.}It is quite a hot day.Yesterday was cold so I wore a {jumper}and a pair of{denim jeans. We have a {school uniform }of grey skirt,white shirt,grey jumper and tie,but most of the older children only wear it for special events like Music Festivals.
